imdb.title: My Mom and My Mother-in-Law
plot: What mother thinks a girl is ever worthy of her precious son? Chen Da Ke (Jia Nai Liang) had the ideal marriage all planned out by his mother (Zheng Wen Qin), until Luo Jia (Li Xiao Lu) came into the picture and stole Da Ke's heart.
